Message:
Why am I trembling?
Is this not how things
hath always been?

Someone protects me, then dies.
Should I not be accustomed
to such a sight?

’Tis times like these when
I must act like a princess...

But, what doth it even mean
to act like a princess?

That ’tis unbefitting to feel
sorrow upon someone’s death?

No. The only thing that
was unbefitting was me.

Every life bears the same value,
each one irreplaceable.​
Asahi...every shadow who hath gone...
nothing can replace them!
“...I long to see thee again, Asahi.”

“Then, why not let her
come back to life?”

In that moment,
I heard someone whisper
into mine ear once more.

“You are special.
That’s something
you’re allowed to do.”

Verily. I am special.
All in this world exists for me!

All live and die...
as I so desire...!
